replies.body:
I already mained Lissandra during her teaser.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I main Ao shin {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
You're but an Impostor. I am Ao Shin himself.

Correction:    Korean Ao Shin

Kim-Jong Shin, if you will.

Why is it that all Koreans are defined by ONE dictator that isn't even in the country that all the Korean gamers play in? He's North Korean; the majority of all Koreans are South Korean and all the gamers, I'm pretty sure, are South Korean. Anyway, just because one dictator is Korean shouldn't mean that everyone makes jokes to all Koreans like that. Do I make jokes by call Germans Hitler??!!! No! Do I make jokes and call Italians Mussolini? No! If someone did, everybody would be calling them racist or stereotypical or something. As half Korean, I don't find those jokes funny at all. So stop.

I'm sorry if I offended you. My friends and I don't really have filters, and we're a very culturally diverse group so racism is actually a common form of joking around (as horrible as it sounds, it can be pretty funny). It shouldn't translate to the internet, but it does.
You're correct, they are all South Korean gamers; North Korea actually has a ban on the internet I believe.

So sincerely, from the bottom of my heart, *my bad*.

It's ok, I'm sorry as well I kinda overreacted. It's just I hear a lot of these jokes and looking back on it, it was probably meant in lightheartedness, unlike many who use it as a slur towards me. I shouldn't have reacted that much, I'm sorry as well.

http://image.slidesharecdn.com/holocaust-100610221743-phpapp02/95/holocaust-17-728.jpg?cb=1276208939

Even the forest was a Nazi.
imposter, I would know, I've been maining ao shin since sometime around 1944.
When people cried about GP being disabled it hurt because it seems the community has forgotten about my main Omen!
The real permaban.
They are so used to it it doesn't even show up in Lolking :(
Because the only statistic would be 100% banrate. They omit so you can load the page 0.000001 seconds faster.
I used to main him but he is so weak now after his nerfs
I main urf
oh yea well I main  tiki... Props to you if you know who he was
i main omen since S1, feels bad knowing i'm the only omen main in here

{{champion:202}} "Hi there. I heard you're an assassin."
{{champion:238}} "Yes. You stand no chance-"
*Shoots Zed and kills him instantly*
{{champion:202}} *sees exclamation mark show up above head*
Huh.
{{champion:107}} "ROA0-"
*One-shots Rengar mid-leap*
{{champion:202}} "That settles that."
{{champion:223}} "Nice mask. Maybe I'll consider it garnish!"
{{champion:202}} "Ugh... why would anybody listen to such an ugly, fat, pathetic creature. Go back to the sewers, you blubbery troglodyte."
